title: Battle scars: an overview of our defence against disease
creator_contributor_role: East Australian Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Antibiotics
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diseases
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Immune response
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Vaccination
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Immune system
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Natural immunity
description: This program investigates the Human immune system and what defences the human body has against disease. Topics covered in this area include: physical barriers against disease, means of pathogenic entry into the body, defences of the body against entry of pathogens, antigens and antibodies, role of phagocytes, the immune system and its function, the nature of immunity, vaccines and their development and the function of antibiotics.
